name: calabaza
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of squash (= a large vegetable with a hard skin and a lot of seeds at its centre) that is commonly grown in the Caribbean : Let the stew simmer until the calabaza pieces are soft. Cut a 100 g slice of calabaza squash into 4 pieces, and remove the peel.
More examplesFewer examplesThe fresh produce section is filled with shelves of plantains, papayas, calabazas, and fresh sugar cane.Calabaza is frequently better than pumpkin when cooked in the same way. Cut the calabaza into 2 cm cubes.
